MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Mehr Guard analyses potential threats directly on your hardware. Experience zero-latency phishing detection without compromising data privacy." to "Mehr Guard menganalisis ancaman potensial langsung di perangkat keras Anda. MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Mehr Guard operates entirely on your local hardware. No image data, scanned URLs, or telemetry are sent to the cloud for analysis." to "Mehr Guard beroperasi sepenuhnya di perangkat keras lokal Anda. Tidak ada data gambar, URL yang dipindai, atau telemetri yang dikirim ke cloud untuk analisis."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard memproses setiap pemindaian dalam sandbox lokal yang aman dan terisolasi. Kami memprioritaskan keamanan yang dapat dijelaskan dengan nol telemetri cloud untuk analisis gambar."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Offline mode enabled. Disable Strict Offline Mode to open URLs." to "Mode offline diaktifkan. Nonaktifkan Mode Offline Ketat untuk membuka URL."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to "Dioptimalkan untuk lingkungan desktop. Pemindaian diproses dalam waktu kurang dari 5ms menggunakan biner Kotlin Multiplatform native."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Paranoia mode enables maximum scrutiny. All edge cases trigger warnings. Best for high-security needs." to "Mode paranoia mengaktifkan pemeriksaan maksimum. Semua kasus tepi memicu peringatan. Terbaik untuk kebutuhan keamanan tinggi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Proceed with caution. Verify the source before clicking." to "Lanjutkan dengan hati-hati. Verifikasi sumber sebelum mengklik."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Real-time audit logs of all QR code captures, including verdicts from the local heuristic engine." to "Log audit waktu nyata dari semua pengambilan kode QR, termasuk vonis dari mesin heuristik lokal."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Registered less than 48 hours ago via cheap registrar." to "Didaftarkan kurang dari 48 jam lalu melalui registrar murah."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Scanning for QR codes. Hold the code steady within the frame." to "Memindai kode QR. Tahan kode dengan stabil dalam bingkai."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Score based on heuristic analysis of domain age, entropy, and keyword matching." to "Skor berdasarkan analisis heuristik usia domain, entropi, dan pencocokan kata kunci."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The ML model classified this URL as benign with high certainty. The structure matches known legitimate authentication patterns." to "Model ML mengklasifikasikan URL ini sebagai jinak dengan kepastian tinggi. Strukturnya cocok dengan pola autentikasi sah yang dikenal."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL appears to impersonate a well-known brand, which is a common phishing tactic." to "URL tampaknya meniru merek terkenal, yang merupakan taktik phishing umum."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL contains parameters that suggest credential harvesting." to "URL berisi parameter yang menunjukkan pengumpulan kredensial."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL has an unusual number of subdomains, which can be used to mislead users." to "URL memiliki jumlah subdomain yang tidak biasa, yang dapat digunakan untuk menyesatkan pengguna."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL is unusually long, which can be used to hide the actual destination." to "URL sangat panjang, yang dapat digunakan untuk menyembunyikan tujuan sebenarnya."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL uses HTTP instead of HTTPS, meaning data is not encrypted." to "URL menggunakan HTTP alih-alih HTTPS, artinya data tidak terenkripsi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL uses a dangerous scheme that can execute code." to "URL menggunakan skema berbahaya yang dapat mengeksekusi kode."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL uses a shortening service, hiding the actual destination." to "URL menggunakan layanan pemendekan, menyembunyikan tujuan sebenarnya."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The URL uses an IP address instead of a domain name, which is unusual for legitimate sites." to "URL menggunakan alamat IP alih-alih nama domain, yang tidak biasa untuk situs yang sah."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The domain micros0ft-support.com uses a zero '0' instead of the letter 'o'." to "Domain micros0ft-support.com menggunakan angka nol '0' alih-alih huruf 'o'."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The domain uses a top-level domain commonly associated with malicious sites." to "Domain menggunakan TLD yang sering dikaitkan dengan situs berbahaya."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The entire threat signature database is downloaded to your device for millisecond lookups." to "Seluruh database tanda tangan ancaman diunduh ke perangkat Anda untuk pencarian dalam milidetik."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"The scanned QR code redirects to a known phishing vector designed to harvest credentials." to "Kode QR yang dipindai mengarahkan ke vektor phishing yang dikenal yang dirancang untuk mengumpulkan kredensial."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"This URL appears safe to visit. Our analysis did not detect any phishing indicators." to "URL ini tampaknya aman untuk dikunjungi. Analisis kami tidak mendeteksi indikator phishing."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"This URL appears to be safe with a risk score of %d. No significant phishing indicators were detected." to "URL ini tampak aman dengan skor risiko %d. Tidak ada indikator phishing signifikan yang terdeteksi."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"This URL has some suspicious characteristics with a risk score of %d. Several potential phishing indicators were found." to "URL ini memiliki karakteristik mencurigakan dengan skor risiko %d. Beberapa indikator phishing potensial ditemukan."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"This URL is likely malicious with a high risk score of %d. Multiple strong phishing indicators were detected." to "URL ini kemungkinan berbahaya dengan skor risiko tinggi %d. Beberapa indikator phishing kuat terdeteksi."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"This will permanently delete all scan records. This action cannot be undone." to "Ini akan menghapus semua catatan pemindaian secara permanen. Tindakan ini tidak dapat dibatalkan."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"This will reset all settings to their default values. Your scan history will not be affected." to "Ini akan mengatur ulang semua pengaturan ke nilai default. Riwayat pemindaian Anda tidak akan terpengaruh."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"To scan QR codes directly, please enable camera access on your device or use the manual input options below." to "Untuk memindai kode QR secara langsung, silakan aktifkan akses kamera di perangkat Anda atau gunakan opsi input manual di bawah."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"URL involves 3+ redirects through unrelated shortening services." to "URL melibatkan 3+ redirect melalui layanan pemendek yang tidak terkait."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Unable to fully analyze. Verify manually before visiting." to "Tidak dapat menganalisis sepenuhnya. Verifikasi secara manual sebelum mengunjungi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Use the search box to filter by domain, source, or hash" to "Gunakan kotak pencarian untuk memfilter berdasarkan domain, sumber, atau hash"

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Valid SSL certificate present. Note: Valid SSL does not guarantee site legitimacy." to "Sertifikat SSL valid ada. Catatan: SSL valid tidak menjamin legitimasi situs."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Verified ownership by Microsoft Corporation via EV Certificate." to "Kepemilikan diverifikasi oleh Microsoft Corporation melalui Sertifikat EV."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"We strictly disable outgoing telemetry for scans. Scan results and image hashes remain local." to "Kami menonaktifkan telemetri keluar secara ketat untuk pemindaian. Hasil pemindaian dan hash gambar tetap lokal."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIn.kt$"Zero intermediate redirects found. Destination is final." to "Tidak ada redirect perantara ditemukan. Tujuan adalah final."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"A shortened link shared in a group chat without context." to "Un link abbreviato condiviso in una chat di gruppo senza contesto."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"All security checks passed with low risk score." to "Tutti i controlli di sicurezza superati con punteggio di rischio basso."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Balanced mode uses standard heuristics. Flags known malicious patterns and suspicious URL shorteners." to "La modalit bilanciata usa euristiche standard. Segnala pattern malevoli noti e abbreviatori URL sospetti."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Brand logo detected on landing page: Global Bank Ltd" to "Logo del brand rilevato sulla landing page: Global Bank Ltd"
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Certificate Issuer matches domain owner (DigiCert Inc)." to "L'emittente del certificato corrisponde al proprietario del dominio (DigiCert Inc)."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Changes apply immediately to navigation labels." to "Le modifiche si applicano immediatamente alle etichette di navigazione."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Code execution happens in an ephemeral container. Malicious payloads never touch an OS kernel." to "L'esecuzione del codice avviene in un container effimero. I payload malevoli non toccano mai il kernel del sistema operativo."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Complete analysis is performed locally. Your camera feed and scanned data never touch an external server, ensuring absolute privacy." to "L'analisi completa viene eseguita localmente. I dati della fotocamera e i dati scansionati non toccano mai un server esterno, garantendo privacy assoluta."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Corporate IT sent a reset notice using the official Google auth domain." to "L'IT aziendale ha inviato un avviso di reset usando il dominio ufficiale Google auth."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Do not visit this URL. It shows strong phishing indicators." to "Non visitare questo URL. Mostra forti indicatori di phishing."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Domain is not yet listed on major threat intelligence feeds." to "Il dominio non ancora elencato nei principali feed di intelligence sulle minacce."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Domain registered > 20 years ago. High reputation score." to "Dominio registrato > 20 anni fa. Punteggio reputazione alto."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Domain uses Cyrillic characters to mimic legitimate Latin letters." to "Il dominio usa caratteri cirillici per imitare lettere latine legittime."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Domain uses a standard top-level domain with good reputation." to "Il dominio usa un TLD standard con buona reputazione."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Domain uses lookalike characters to mimic legitimate sites." to "Il dominio usa caratteri simili per imitare siti legittimi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Domain was registered today. Highly suspicious for banking services." to "Dominio registrato oggi. Altamente sospetto per servizi bancari."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Don't just get a \"Block\". We provide detailed heuristic breakdowns of URL parameters, redirects, and javascript payloads." to "Non ricevere solo un \"Blocco\". Forniamo analisi euristiche dettagliate di parametri URL, reindirizzamenti e payload JavaScript."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Found this on a table at Starbeans Coffee. It offered a free coffee coupon if I logged in." to "Trovato su un tavolo da Starbeans Coffee. Offriva un coupon caff gratis se mi registravo."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Full heuristic and ML analysis completed successfully." to "Analisi euristica e ML completa completata con successo."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Javascript-based redirection (obfuscates destination from crawlers)" to "Reindirizzamento basato su JavaScript (offusca la destinazione dai crawler)"

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Keyboard shortcuts: Cmd/Ctrl+V paste URL, Cmd/Ctrl+, settings, Cmd/Ctrl+1-4 navigate, Enter analyze, Escape go back" to "Scorciatoie: Cmd/Ctrl+V incolla URL, Cmd/Ctrl+, impostazioni, Cmd/Ctrl+1-4 naviga, Enter analizza, Escape indietro"
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Let's Encrypt R3. Note: Valid SSL does not guarantee site legitimacy." to "Let's Encrypt R3. Nota: SSL valido non garantisce legittimit del sito."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Low mode reduces false positives. Only flags confirmed malicious patterns. Best for trusted environments." to "La modalit bassa riduce i falsi positivi. Segnala solo pattern malevoli confermati. Migliore per ambienti fidati."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Majority vote determines verdict: 3+ SAFE = green, 2+ MAL = red" to "Il voto di maggioranza determina il verdetto: 3+ SICURO = verde, 2+ MALIGNO = rosso"

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Manage offline heuristics, data retention policies, and domain allowlists. All changes apply immediately." to "Gestisci euristiche offline, politiche di conservazione dati e whitelist domini. Tutte le modifiche si applicano immediatamente."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Mehr Guard analyses potential threats directly on your hardware. Experience zero-latency phishing detection without compromising data privacy." to "Mehr Guard analizza le potenziali minacce direttamente sul tuo hardware. Sperimenta il rilevamento phishing senza latenza senza compromettere la privacy dei dati."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Mehr Guard operates entirely on your local hardware. No image data, scanned URLs, or telemetry are sent to the cloud for analysis." to "Mehr Guard opera interamente sul tuo hardware locale. Nessun dato immagine, URL scansionati o telemetria viene inviato al cloud per l'analisi."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard elabora ogni scansione all'interno di una sandbox locale sicura e isolata. Diamo priorit alla sicurezza spiegabile con zero telemetria cloud per l'analisi delle immagini."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Mixed script characters detected in domain name intended to spoof legitimate brands." to "Rilevati caratteri script misti nel nome dominio per imitare marchi legittimi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Multiple phishing indicators detected. See threat score for details." to "Rilevati pi indicatori di phishing. Vedere il punteggio di minaccia per i dettagli."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"No URL shorteners or redirect chains detected." to "Nessun accorciatore URL o catena di reindirizzamento rilevato."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"No mixed-script characters or IDN spoofing detected in domain string." to "Nessun carattere misto o spoofing IDN rilevato nella stringa del dominio."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"No scan history yet. Run a scan to populate results." to "Nessuna cronologia scansioni. Esegui una scansione per popolare i risultati."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Offline mode enabled. Disable Strict Offline Mode to open URLs." to "Modalit offline abilitata. Disabilita la Modalit Offline Rigorosa per aprire gli URL."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to "Ottimizzato per ambienti desktop. Le scansioni vengono elaborate in meno di 5ms utilizzando binari nativi Kotlin Multiplatform."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Paranoia mode enables maximum scrutiny. All edge cases trigger warnings. Best for high-security needs." to "La modalit paranoia abilita il massimo controllo. Tutti i casi limite attivano avvisi. Migliore per esigenze di alta sicurezza."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Press these keys when not typing in an input field:" to "Premi questi tasti quando non stai digitando in un campo di input:"
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Proceed with caution. Verify the source before clicking." to "Procedi con cautela. Verifica la fonte prima di cliccare."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Real-time audit logs of all QR code captures, including verdicts from the local heuristic engine." to "Log di audit in tempo reale di tutte le acquisizioni di codici QR, inclusi i verdetti del motore euristico locale."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Registered less than 48 hours ago via cheap registrar." to "Registrato meno di 48 ore fa tramite registrar economico."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Sandbox quarantine is not available on desktop yet." to "La quarantena sandbox non ancora disponibile su desktop."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Scan complete. Review the result screen for details." to "Scansione completata. Controlla la schermata risultati per i dettagli."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Scanning for QR codes. Hold the code steady within the frame." to "Scansione codici QR. Tieni il codice fermo all'interno della cornice."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Score based on heuristic analysis of domain age, entropy, and keyword matching." to "Punteggio basato su analisi euristica di et dominio, entropia e corrispondenza parole chiave."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Secure HTTPS connection with encrypted data transfer." to "Connessione HTTPS sicura con trasferimento dati crittografato."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"System status refresh is not available yet." to "L'aggiornamento dello stato del sistema non ancora disponibile."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The ML model classified this URL as benign with high certainty. The structure matches known legitimate authentication patterns." to "Il modello ML ha classificato questo URL come benigno con alta certezza. La struttura corrisponde a pattern di autenticazione legittimi conosciuti."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL appears to impersonate a well-known brand, which is a common phishing tactic." to "L'URL sembra impersonare un marchio noto, una tattica di phishing comune."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL contains parameters that suggest credential harvesting." to "L'URL contiene parametri che suggeriscono la raccolta di credenziali."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL has an unusual number of subdomains, which can be used to mislead users." to "L'URL ha un numero insolito di sottodomini, che possono essere usati per ingannare gli utenti."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL is unusually long, which can be used to hide the actual destination." to "L'URL insolitamente lungo, pu essere usato per nascondere la destinazione reale."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL uses HTTP instead of HTTPS, meaning data is not encrypted." to "L'URL usa HTTP invece di HTTPS, il che significa che i dati non sono crittografati."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL uses a dangerous scheme that can execute code." to "L'URL utilizza uno schema pericoloso che pu eseguire codice."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL uses a shortening service, hiding the actual destination." to "L'URL utilizza un servizio di abbreviazione, nascondendo la destinazione reale."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The URL uses an IP address instead of a domain name, which is unusual for legitimate sites." to "L'URL usa un indirizzo IP invece di un nome di dominio, cosa insolita per siti legittimi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The \"free coupon\" promise creates urgency and incentive." to "La promessa del \"coupon gratuito\" crea urgenza e incentivo."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The domain micros0ft-support.com uses a zero '0' instead of the letter 'o'." to "Il dominio micros0ft-support.com usa uno zero '0' invece della lettera 'o'."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The domain uses a top-level domain commonly associated with malicious sites." to "Il dominio utilizza un TLD comunemente associato a siti dannosi."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The entire threat signature database is downloaded to your device for millisecond lookups." to "L'intero database delle firme delle minacce viene scaricato sul tuo dispositivo per ricerche in millisecondi."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"The scanned QR code redirects to a known phishing vector designed to harvest credentials." to "Il codice QR scansionato reindirizza a un vettore phishing noto progettato per raccogliere credenziali."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"This URL appears safe to visit. Our analysis did not detect any phishing indicators." to "Questo URL sembra sicuro da visitare. La nostra analisi non ha rilevato indicatori di phishing."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"This URL appears to be safe with a risk score of %d. No significant phishing indicators were detected." to "Questo URL sembra sicuro con un punteggio di rischio di %d. Nessun indicatore di phishing significativo rilevato."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"This URL has some suspicious characteristics with a risk score of %d. Several potential phishing indicators were found." to "Questo URL ha caratteristiche sospette con un punteggio di rischio di %d. Trovati diversi indicatori di phishing potenziali."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"This URL is likely malicious with a high risk score of %d. Multiple strong phishing indicators were detected." to "Questo URL probabilmente malevolo con un punteggio di rischio alto di %d. Rilevati molteplici indicatori di phishing forti."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"This will permanently delete all scan records. This action cannot be undone." to "Questo eliminer permanentemente tutti i record di scansione. Questa azione non pu essere annullata."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"This will reset all settings to their default values. Your scan history will not be affected." to "Questo ripristiner tutte le impostazioni ai valori predefiniti. La cronologia scansioni non sar interessata."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"To scan QR codes directly, please enable camera access on your device or use the manual input options below." to "Per scansionare direttamente i codici QR, abilita l'accesso alla fotocamera sul tuo dispositivo o usa le opzioni di input manuale qui sotto."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"URL involves 3+ redirects through unrelated shortening services." to "L'URL coinvolge 3+ redirect tramite servizi di abbreviazione non correlati."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Unable to fully analyze. Verify manually before visiting." to "Impossibile analizzare completamente. Verifica manualmente prima di visitare."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Update checks are not available in offline mode." to "I controlli aggiornamenti non sono disponibili in modalit offline."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Use the search box to filter by domain, source, or hash" to "Usa la casella di ricerca per filtrare per dominio, origine o hash"

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Valid SSL certificate present. Note: Valid SSL does not guarantee site legitimacy." to "Certificato SSL valido presente. Nota: SSL valido non garantisce la legittimit del sito."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Verified ownership by Microsoft Corporation via EV Certificate." to "Propriet verificata da Microsoft Corporation tramite Certificato EV."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"We strictly disable outgoing telemetry for scans. Scan results and image hashes remain local." to "Disabilitiamo rigorosamente la telemetria in uscita per le scansioni. I risultati delle scansioni e gli hash delle immagini rimangono locali."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"While .com is standard, the hyphenated structure with \"support\" is common in phishing." to "Mentre .com standard, la struttura con trattino con \"support\" comune nel phishing."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsIt.kt$"Zero intermediate redirects found. Destination is final." to "Zero redirect intermedi trovati. Destinazione finale."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Mehr Guard analyses potential threats directly on your hardware. Experience zero-latency phishing detection without compromising data privacy." to "Mehr Guard phn tch cc mi e da tim n trc tip trn phn cng ca bn. Tri nghim pht hin la o khng tr m khng nh hng n quyn ring t d liu."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Mehr Guard operates entirely on your local hardware. No image data, scanned URLs, or telemetry are sent to the cloud for analysis." to "Mehr Guard hot ng hon ton trn phn cng cc b ca bn. Khng c d liu hnh nh, URL qut hoc o t xa c gi ln cloud phn tch."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard x l mi ln qut trong sandbox cc b an ton, c lp. Chng ti u tin bo mt c th gii thch vi zero telemetry cloud cho phn tch hnh nh."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Mixed script characters detected in domain name intended to spoof legitimate brands." to "Pht hin k t script hn hp trong tn min nhm gi mo thng hiu hp php."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Multiple phishing indicators detected. See threat score for details." to "Pht hin nhiu ch s la o. Xem im e da bit chi tit."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"No mixed-script characters or IDN spoofing detected in domain string." to "Khng pht hin k t script hn hp hoc gi mo IDN trong chui tn min."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Offline mode enabled. Disable Strict Offline Mode to open URLs." to "Ch ngoi tuyn bt. Tt Ch Ngoi Tuyn Nghim Ngt m URL."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to "c ti u ha cho mi trng desktop. Qut c x l trong di 5ms s dng cc tp nh phn Kotlin Multiplatform gc."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Paranoia mode enables maximum scrutiny. All edge cases trigger warnings. Best for high-security needs." to "Ch hoang tng cho php kim tra ti a. Tt c cc trng hp cn bin kch hot cnh bo. Tt nht cho nhu cu bo mt cao."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Real-time QR code analysis and threat detection." to "Phn tch m QR theo thi gian thc v pht hin mi e da."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Real-time audit logs of all QR code captures, including verdicts from the local heuristic engine." to "Nht k kim ton thi gian thc ca tt c cc ln chp m QR, bao gm cc phn quyt t ng c heuristic cc b."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Registered less than 48 hours ago via cheap registrar." to "ng k cch y cha n 48 gi qua nh ng k gi r."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Sandbox rendered. No active scripts executed." to "Sandbox render. Khng c script hot ng no c thc thi."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"Score based on heuristic analysis of domain age, entropy, and keyword matching." to "im da trn phn tch heuristic v tui tn min, entropy v khp t kha."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The ML model classified this URL as benign with high certainty. The structure matches known legitimate authentication patterns." to "M hnh ML phn loi URL ny l lnh tnh vi chc chn cao. Cu trc khp vi cc mu xc thc hp php bit."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The URL appears to impersonate a well-known brand, which is a common phishing tactic." to "URL dng nh mo danh mt thng hiu ni ting, y l chin thut la o ph bin."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The URL contains parameters that suggest credential harvesting." to "URL cha cc tham s gi thu thp thng tin xc thc."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The URL has an unusual number of subdomains, which can be used to mislead users." to "URL c s lng tn min ph bt thng, c th c s dng nh la ngi dng."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The URL is unusually long, which can be used to hide the actual destination." to "URL di bt thng, c th c s dng n ch thc."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The URL uses HTTP instead of HTTPS, meaning data is not encrypted." to "URL s dng HTTP thay v HTTPS, c ngha l d liu khng c m ha."

MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The URL uses an IP address instead of a domain name, which is unusual for legitimate sites." to "URL s dng a ch IP thay v tn min, iu ny bt thng i vi cc trang web hp php."
MaxLineLength:DesktopStringsVi.kt$"The \"free coupon\" promise creates urgency and incentive." to "Li ha \"phiu gim gi min ph\" to ra s cp bch v ng lc."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"+30-35 points Requires investigation of actual characters" to "+3035 Punkte Erfordert Untersuchung tatschlicher Zeichen"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"+30-40 points This is a primary phishing indicator" to "+30-40 Punkte Dies ist ein primrer Phishing-Indikator"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"+40-50 points Advanced attack requiring intentional deception" to "+40-50 Punkte Fortgeschrittener Angriff, der absichtliche Tuschung erfordert"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"A shorter, cleaner URL would reduce this signal contribution by ~8 points." to "Eine krzere, sauberere URL wrde diesen Signalbeitrag um ~8 Punkte reduzieren."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"AI-powered phishing detection running 100% offline in your browser." to "KI-gesttzte Phishing-Erkennung luft zu 100 % offline in Ihrem Browser."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Adjust heuristic thresholds. Higher sensitivity may increase false positives." to "Heuristische Schwellenwerte anpassen. Eine hhere Empfindlichkeit kann zu einer Zunahme falsch positiver Ergebnisse fhren."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"All code execution happens in an ephemeral container that is destroyed after each scan. This ensures malicious payloads can never escape to your system." to "Die gesamte Codeausfhrung erfolgt in einem kurzlebigen Container, der nach jedem Scan zerstrt wird. Dadurch wird sichergestellt, dass schdliche Payloads niemals in Ihr System gelangen knnen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Apple only uses apple.com for all account-related activities. Be wary of domains containing brand names but with different extensions." to "Apple verwendet apple.com nur fr alle kontobezogenen Aktivitten. Seien Sie vorsichtig bei Domains, die Markennamen, aber mit unterschiedlichen Endungen enthalten."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Apple would never use a third-party domain for account verification. Check the actual domain name." to "Apple wrde niemals eine Drittanbieter-Domain zur Kontobesttigung verwenden. berprfen Sie den tatschlichen Domnennamen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Are you sure you want to end this session? Progress will be lost." to "Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie diese Sitzung beenden mchten? Fortschritte gehen verloren."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Atlassian is a legitimate software company. Their primary domain atlassian.com is trustworthy." to "Atlassian ist ein serises Softwareunternehmen. Ihre primre Domain atlassian.com ist vertrauenswrdig."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Attackers create domains that look like trusted brands to steal credentials" to "Angreifer erstellen Domains, die wie vertrauenswrdige Marken aussehen, um Anmeldeinformationen zu stehlen"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Can redirect through tracking or to malicious destinations" to "Kann durch Tracking oder zu bswilligen Zielen umgeleitet werden"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Certificate Issuer matches domain owner (DigiCert Inc)" to "Zertifikataussteller entspricht Domnenbesitzer (DigiCert Inc)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Certificate Issuer matches domain owner (DigiCert Inc)." to "Zertifikataussteller entspricht Domnenbesitzer (DigiCert Inc)."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Certificate issued by DigiCert Inc. No anomalies in chain of trust." to "Zertifikat ausgestellt von DigiCert Inc. Keine Anomalien in der Vertrauenskette."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Certificate issued by trusted CA. No anomalies in chain of trust." to "Zertifikat ausgestellt von vertrauenswrdiger Zertifizierungsstelle. Keine Anomalien in der Vertrauenskette."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Certificate recently issued or self-signed. Proceed with caution." to "Zertifikat krzlich ausgestellt oder selbstsigniert. Gehen Sie vorsichtig vor."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Challenge Mehr Guard's offline AI engine. Can you spot phishing URLs faster than the bot?" to "Fordern Sie die Offline-KI-Engine von Mehr Guard heraus. Knnen Sie Phishing-URLs schneller erkennen als der Bot?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Challenge our offline AI engine. Can you spot the phish faster?" to "Fordern Sie unsere Offline-KI-Engine heraus. Knnen Sie den Phish schneller erkennen?"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Characters like Cyrillic \"\" look identical to Latin \"a\" but are different" to "Zeichen wie das kyrillische sehen genauso aus wie das lateinische a, unterscheiden sich aber"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Check the domain carefully. This appears to be a well-known, trusted domain." to "berprfen Sie die Domain sorgfltig. Dies scheint eine bekannte, vertrauenswrdige Domne zu sein."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Click a sample below or paste any URL:" to "Klicken Sie unten auf ein Beispiel oder fgen Sie eine beliebige URL ein:"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Code execution happens in an ephemeral container. Malicious payloads never touch your OS kernel." to "Die Codeausfhrung erfolgt in einem kurzlebigen Container. Schdliche Payloads berhren niemals Ihren Betriebssystemkernel."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Combined with other signals, suggests intent to steal credentials" to "In Kombination mit anderen Signalen deutet dies auf die Absicht hin, Anmeldeinformationen zu stehlen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Complete analysis is performed locally. Your camera feed and scanned data never touch an external server, ensuring absolute privacy." to "Die vollstndige Analyse wird lokal durchgefhrt. Ihr Kamera-Feed und Ihre gescannten Daten berhren niemals einen externen Server und gewhrleisten so absolute Privatsphre."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Configure formats and download your threat analysis." to "Konfigurieren Sie Formate und laden Sie Ihre Bedrohungsanalyse herunter."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Cyrillic characters mimicking Latin alphabet detected." to "Kyrillische Zeichen, die das lateinische Alphabet imitieren erkannt."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Deep subdomains can hide the actual domain at the end" to "Tiefe Subdomains knnen die tatschliche Domain am Ende verbergen"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Destination URL obfuscated. Unable to verify final target." to "Ziel-URL verschleiert. Das endgltige Ziel konnte nicht verifiziert werden."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Domain contains or mimics a known brand name (PayPal, Amazon, etc.)" to "Domain enthlt oder imitiert einen bekannten Markennamen (PayPal, Amazon, usw.)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Domain mimics known brand (PayPal Paypa1). High-confidence phishing." to "Domain imitiert bekannte Marke (PayPal Paypa1). Hochvertrauliches Phishing."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Domain or path contains random-looking character sequences" to "Domain oder Pfad enthlt zufllig aussehende Zeichenfolgen"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Domain registered > 5 years ago. Low probability of churn-and-burn." to "Domain vor > 5 Jahren registriert. Geringe Wahrscheinlichkeit von Churn-and-Burn."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Domain uses common misspellings or character substitutions (paypa1, amaz0n)" to "Domain verwendet hufige Rechtschreibfehler oder Zeichenersetzungen (paypa1, amaz0n)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Domain uses suspicious hyphenated structure (verify-deliveries.net)" to "Domain verwendet verdchtige Bindestrichstruktur (verify-deliveries.net)"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Don't just get a \"Block\". We provide detailed heuristic breakdowns of URL parameters, redirects, and javascript payloads." to "Erhalten Sie nicht einfach eine Blockierung. Wir bieten detaillierte heuristische Aufschlsselungen von URL-Parametern, Weiterleitungen und Javascript-Nutzlasten."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Drag & drop a QR code image here or enable camera access to start scanning." to "Ziehen Sie ein QR-Code-Bild hier per Drag & Drop oder aktivieren Sie den Kamerazugriff, um mit dem Scannen zu beginnen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Exports include all identified threat vectors, headers, and the raw payload analysis." to "Die Exporte umfassen alle identifizierten Bedrohungsvektoren, Header und die Rohnutzlastanalyse."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"For the best experience, use Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge." to "Fr die beste Erfahrung verwenden Sie Chrome, Firefox, Safari oder Edge."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Free/cheap TLDs are heavily abused for throwaway phishing domains" to "Kostenlose/gnstige TLDs werden stark missbraucht Wegwerf-Phishing-Domains"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"GitHub.com is a legitimate developer platform owned by Microsoft. Always verify the exact domain spelling." to "GitHub.com ist eine legitime Entwicklerplattform im Besitz von Microsoft. berprfen Sie immer die genaue Schreibweise der Domain."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Google Docs uses docs.google.com. Always verify the sender knows you before opening shared documents." to "Google Docs verwendet docs.google.com. Stellen Sie immer sicher, dass der Absender Sie kennt, bevor Sie freigegebene Dokumente ffnen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Google services use subdomains of google.com. mail.google.com is the legitimate Gmail address." to "Google-Dienste verwenden Subdomains von google.com. mail.google.com ist die legitime Gmail-Adresse."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"High-confidence phishing detected. This URL exhibits multiple malicious indicators." to "High-Confidenz-Phishing erkannt. Diese URL weist mehrere schdliche Indikatoren auf."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Homograph attack: \"c0mmonwealth\" uses zero instead of letter O" to "Homograph-Angriff: c0mmonwealth verwendet Null anstelle des Buchstabens O"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Homograph attack: \"paypa1\" uses number 1 instead of letter L" to "Homograph-Angriff: paypa1 verwendet Nummer 1 anstelle des Buchstabens L"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Homograph attacks use similar-looking characters. Always check URLs character by character for suspicious substitutions." to "Homograph Angriffe verwenden hnlich aussehende Charaktere. berprfen Sie URLs immer Zeichen fr Zeichen auf verdchtige Ersetzungen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"I am reporting a suspected phishing URL detected by Mehr Guard:" to "Ich melde eine mutmaliche Phishing-URL, die von Mehr Guard entdeckt wurde:"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If HTTPS was used, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~18 points." to "Wenn HTTPS verwendet wrde, wrde dieses Signal nicht ausgelst und die Punktzahl wrde um ~18 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If a registered domain name was used instead of IP address, score would drop by ~28 points." to "Wenn ein registrierter Domainname anstelle der IP-Adresse verwendet wrde, wrde die Punktzahl um ~28 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If all characters were ASCII Latin letters, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~45 points." to "Wenn alle Zeichen lateinische ASCII-Buchstaben wren, wrde dieses Signal nicht ausgelst und die Punktzahl wrde sinken ~45 Punkte."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If no embedded URLs were present in query parameters, score would drop by ~18 points." to "Wenn in den Abfrageparametern keine eingebetteten URLs vorhanden wren, wrde die Punktzahl um ~18 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If only 1-2 subdomains were used, this signal would not trigger. Score would drop by ~12 points." to "Wenn nur 1-2 Subdomains verwendet wrden, wrde dieses Signal nicht ausgelst. Die Punktzahl wrde um ~12 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If the domain spelled the brand correctly without substitutions, score would drop by ~25 points." to "Wenn die Domain die Marke ohne Ersetzungen korrekt buchstabieren wrde, wrde die Punktzahl um ~25 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If the domain used only ASCII characters (no IDN), score would drop by ~32 points." to "Wenn die Domain nur ASCII-Zeichen (keine IDN) verwenden wrde, wrde die Punktzahl um ~32 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If the domain used readable words instead of random characters, score would drop by ~12 points." to "Wenn die Domain lesbare Wrter anstelle von Zufallszeichen verwenden wrde, wrde die Punktzahl um ~12 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If the full destination URL was visible, score would drop by ~18 points (assuming destination is safe)." to "Wenn die vollstndige Ziel-URL verwendet wrde Wenn diese URL sichtbar ist, wrde die Punktzahl um etwa 18 Punkte sinken (vorausgesetzt, das Ziel ist sicher)."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If this URL used .com, .org, or country TLDs, score would drop by ~25 points." to "Wenn diese URL .com, .org oder Lnder-TLDs verwendet, wrde die Punktzahl um etwa 25 Punkte sinken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"If this were the official brand domain (paypal.com), this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~35 points." to "Wre dies die offizielle Markendomain (paypal.com), wrde dieses Signal nicht ausgelst und die Punktzahl wrde um ~35 Punkte sinken."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"International domains can hide malicious lookalike characters" to "Internationale Domains knnen bsartige hnliche Zeichen verbergen"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Learn how to identify advanced QR homograph attacks." to "Erfahren Sie, wie Sie fortgeschrittene QR-Homograph-Angriffe erkennen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Legitimate services use domains; IPs hide identity and bypass filters" to "Legitime Dienste nutzen Domnen; IPs verbergen Identitt und umgehen Filter"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"LinkedIn uses linkedin.com as their primary domain. Profile URLs follow the /in/username format." to "LinkedIn verwendet LinkedIn.com als primre Domain. Profil-URLs folgen dem Format /in/Benutzername."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Local database v2.4.1 active. No data leaves this device." to "Lokale Datenbank v2.4.1 aktiv. Keine Daten verlassen dieses Gert."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Long URLs can hide malicious parameters or overwhelm users" to "Lange URLs knnen schdliche Parameter verbergen oder Benutzer berfordern"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Look at the domain carefully. Is \"c0mmonwealth\" spelled correctly? The number 0 is often used to replace the letter O." to "Sehen Sie sich die Domain genau an. Ist c0mmonwealth richtig geschrieben? Die Zahl 0 wird oft verwendet, um den Buchstaben O zu ersetzen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Look at the domain name carefully. Is \"paypa1\" spelled correctly?" to "Sehen Sie sich den Domainnamen genau an. Ist paypa1 richtig geschrieben?"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Look closely at the domain structure. Legitimate organisations rarely use hyphens in the main domain name or generic TLDs like" to "Schauen Sie sich die Domainstruktur genau an. Serise Organisationen verwenden selten Bindestriche im Hauptdomnennamen oder generischen TLDs wie"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Manage privacy controls, sensitivity, and security lists." to "Verwalten Sie Datenschutzkontrollen, Vertraulichkeit und Sicherheitslisten."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Matched 3 signatures in local phishing DB." to "bereinstimmung mit 3 Signaturen in der lokalen Phishing-Datenbank."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Maximum protection. Blocks any suspicious patterns including newly registered domains, uncommon TLDs, and any URL with potential encoding tricks." to "Maximaler Schutz. Blockiert alle verdchtigen Muster, einschlielich neu registrierter Domains, ungewhnlicher TLDs und aller URLs mit potenziellen Codierungstricks."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Active Scanner - Real-time QR code scanning with AI-powered phishing detection." to "Mehr Guard Aktiver Scanner QR-Code-Scanning in Echtzeit mit KI-gesttzter Phishing-Erkennung."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Dashboard - Enterprise offline QR code security with explainable threat detection." to "Mehr Guard Dashboard Enterprise-Offline-QR-Code-Sicherheit mit erklrbarer Bedrohungserkennung."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Privacy Settings - 100% offline protection with zero cloud telemetry." to "Mehr Guard Datenschutzeinstellungen 100 % Offline-Schutz ohne Cloud-Telemetrie."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Report Export - Generate and download threat analysis reports in PDF or JSON format." to "Mehr Guard Berichtsexport Bedrohungsanalyseberichte als PDF oder JSON erstellen und herunterladen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Threat Analysis - Detailed scan result showing attack breakdown and security recommendations." to "Mehr Guard Bedrohungsanalyse Detailliertes Scan-Ergebnis mit Angriffsauswertung und Sicherheitsempfehlungen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Trust Centre - Manage privacy controls, detection sensitivity, and security lists." to "Mehr Guard Trust Centre Datenschutzkontrollen, Erkennungsempfindlichkeit und Sicherheitslisten verwalten."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard Web - AI-powered phishing detection running entirely in your browser. Scan and analyze URLs for security threats." to "Mehr Guard Web KI-gesttzte Phishing-Erkennung luft vollstndig in Ihrem Browser. Scannen und analysieren Sie URLs auf Sicherheitsbedrohungen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard analyses potential threats directly on your hardware. Experience" to "Mehr Guard analysiert potenzielle Bedrohungen direkt auf Ihrer Hardware. Erfahrung"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard needs camera access to scan QR codes in real-time." to "Mehr Guard bentigt Kamerazugriff, um QR-Codes in Echtzeit zu scannen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard verarbeitet jeden Scan in einer sicheren, isolierten lokalen Sandbox. Wir priorisieren erklrbare Sicherheit mit Zero-Cloud-Telemetrie fr die Bildanalyse."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard scan results - AI-powered phishing detection with detailed security analysis." to "Mehr Guard Scan-Ergebnisse KI-gesttzte Phishing-Erkennung mit detaillierter Sicherheitsanalyse."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard strictly disables all outgoing telemetry. Your scan results, URL history, and image hashes never leave your device." to "Mehr Guard deaktiviert strikt alle ausgehenden Telemetriedaten. Ihre Scan-Ergebnisse, URL-Verlauf und Bild-Hashes verlassen niemals Ihr Gert."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard uses local heuristic analysis engines. No image data, URL strings, or metadata leaves this device during scanning. Your privacy is mathematically guaranteed." to "Mehr Guard verwendet lokale heuristische Analyse-Engines. Whrend des Scanvorgangs verlassen keine Bilddaten, URL-Strings oder Metadaten dieses Gert. Ihre Privatsphre ist mathematisch garantiert."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Mehr Guard works 100% offline! All analysis is done locally on your device. No internet connection required." to "Mehr Guard funktioniert 100 % offline! Die gesamte Analyse erfolgt lokal auf Ihrem Gert. Keine Internetverbindung erforderlich."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"More than 3 subdomain levels (secure.login.paypal.fake.com)" to "Mehr als 3 Subdomain-Ebenen (secure.login.paypal.fake.com)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Need help? Visit our GitHub for documentation" to "Bentigen Sie Hilfe? Besuchen Sie unseren GitHub fr Dokumentation"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Never trust shortened URLs from unknown sources. Use URL expander tools to see the real destination before clicking." to "Vertrauen Sie niemals verkrzten URLs aus unbekannten Quellen. Verwenden Sie URL-Expander-Tools, um das tatschliche Ziel anzuzeigen, bevor Sie darauf klicken."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"No security threats were detected. The QR code leads to a verified safe destination." to "Es wurden keine Sicherheitsbedrohungen erkannt. Der QR-Code fhrt zu einem verifizierten sicheren Ziel."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Official postal services use their primary domain (auspost.com.au) for all tracking. Verify by visiting the official website directly." to "Offizielle Postdienste verwenden ihre primre Domain (auspost.com.au) fr die gesamte Nachverfolgung. berprfen Sie dies, indem Sie direkt die offizielle Website besuchen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Only blocks known malicious URLs from the threat database. Minimal false positives, but may miss novel attacks." to "Blockiert nur bekannte schdliche URLs aus der Bedrohungsdatenbank. Minimale Fehlalarme, aber mglicherweise bersehen neuartige Angriffe."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to "Optimiert fr Desktop-Umgebungen. Scans werden in weniger als 5ms mit nativen Kotlin-Multiplattform-Binrdateien verarbeitet."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Privacy policy: 100% offline, zero data collection" to "Datenschutzrichtlinie: 100 % offline, keine Datenerfassung"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Randomly generated domains are often temporary phishing sites" to "Zufllig generierte Domains sind oft temporre Phishing-Sites"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Removing or changing the suspicious pattern would reduce the overall risk score." to "Das Entfernen oder ndern des verdchtigen Musters wrde die reduzieren Gesamtrisikobewertung."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Scan this QR code with Mehr Guard to see malicious URL detection:" to "Scannen Sie diesen QR-Code mit Mehr Guard, um die Erkennung schdlicher URLs zu sehen:"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Scans for known malicious patterns and heuristic mismatches. Blocks homoglyph attacks and redirect chains. Low false positive rate expected." to "Scannen nach bekannten schdlichen Mustern und heuristischen Abweichungen. Blockiert Homoglyphenangriffe und Weiterleitungsketten. Niedrige Falsch-Positiv-Rate erwartet."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Settings are saved automatically and sync across sessions." to "Einstellungen werden automatisch gespeichert und synchronisiert Sitzungen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Short URLs hide the actual destination. Prize claims from unknown numbers are almost always scams." to "Kurze URLs verbergen das eigentliche Ziel. Gewinnansprche von unbekannten Nummern sind fast immer Betrug."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Some features may not work in your browser." to "Einige Mglicherweise funktionieren die Funktionen in Ihrem Browser nicht."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Some minor security concerns were identified. The link appears mostly safe but review recommended." to "Es wurden einige geringfgige Sicherheitsbedenken festgestellt. Der Link erscheint grtenteils sicher, eine berprfung wird jedoch empfohlen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Some suspicious indicators detected. Verify the source before entering sensitive information." to "Einige verdchtige Indikatoren erkannt. berprfen Sie die Quelle, bevor Sie vertrauliche Informationen eingeben."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"The domain uses the Cyrillic '' (U+0430) instead of Latin 'a' (U+0061)." to "Die Domain verwendet das kyrillische (U+0430) anstelle des lateinischen a (U+0061)."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"The entire threat signature database (100,000+ patterns) is stored locally for millisecond lookups without any network requests." to "Die gesamte Bedrohungssignaturdatenbank (mehr als 100.000 Muster) wird lokal fr Millisekunden-Suchvorgnge ohne Netzwerkanfragen gespeichert."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"The entire threat signature database is downloaded to your device for millisecond lookups." to "Die gesamte Bedrohungssignaturdatenbank wird fr Millisekunden-Suchvorgnge auf Ihr Gert heruntergeladen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"The number 1 and lowercase L look identical in many fonts. Always verify paypal.com directly." to "Die Zahl 1 und der Kleinbuchstabe L sehen in vielen Schriftarten identisch aus. berprfen Sie paypal.com immer direkt."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"The scanned QR code contains malicious indicators associated with phishing and credential harvesting. MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"The scanned QR code shows suspicious patterns that may indicate potential security risks. Proceed with caution." to "Der gescannte QR-Code weist verdchtige Muster auf, die auf potenzielle Sicherheitsrisiken hinweisen knnen. Gehen Sie vorsichtig vor."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"Think you can outsmart our AI? Try to craft a phishing URL that fools the detector!" to "Denken Sie, Sie knnen unsere KI berlisten? Versuchen Sie, eine Phishing-URL zu erstellen, die den Detektor tuscht!"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"This image was analysed locally on your device. No data was sent to the cloud for this verdict." to "Dieses Bild wurde lokal auf Ihrem Gert analysiert. Fr dieses Urteil wurden keine Daten an die Cloud gesendet."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$"This is a Google subdomain - check if it\\'s the legitimate Gmail service." to "Dies ist eine Google-Subdomain prfen Sie, ob es sich um den legitimen Gmail-Dienst handelt."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.DangerousWarning to "Diese URL wurde als potenziell gefhrlich markiert. Das ffnen kann Sie Phishing, Malware oder anderen Sicherheitsbedrohungen aussetzen. Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie fortfahren mchten?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.DomainUsesInternationalChars to "Diese Domain verwendet internationale Zeichen, die legitime Domains imitieren knnten."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureExplainableDesc to "Erhalten Sie nicht nur ein \"Block\". Wir bieten detaillierte heuristische Aufschlsselungen von URL-Parametern, Weiterleitungen und Javascript-Payloads."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureOfflineDesc to "Die gesamte Analyse erfolgt lokal. Ihr Kamera-Feed und Ihre gescannten Daten berhren niemals einen externen Server, was absolute Privatsphre gewhrleistet."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.FeaturePerformanceDesc to "Optimiert fr Desktop-Umgebungen. Scans werden in unter 5ms mit nativen Kotlin Multiplatform-Binrdateien verarbeitet."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.HeroDescription to "Mehr Guard analysiert potenzielle Bedrohungen direkt auf Ihrer Hardware. Erleben Sie Schutz ohne Latenz."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.HeuristicAnalysisDesc to "URL wurde basierend auf mehreren von der Analyse-Engine erkannten Risikofaktoren markiert."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.LowSensitivityModeDesc to "Blockiert nur bekannte bsartige URLs aus der Bedrohungsdatenbank. Minimale Fehlalarme, kann aber neue Angriffe bersehen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.MetaOfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Dieses Bild wurde lokal auf Ihrem Gert analysiert. Es wurden keine Daten fr dieses Urteil an die Cloud gesendet."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.MixedScriptAttackDesc to "Domain enthlt Zeichen aus mehreren Schriftsystemen (z.B. Kyrillisch + Latein). Hufig bei Homograph-Angriffen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.NoScanDataResults to "Keine Scandaten verfgbar. Bitte scannen Sie eine URL, um Analyseergebnisse zu sehen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.OfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Die Mehr Guard-Analyse luft vollstndig auf der Neural Engine Ihres Gerts. URL-Daten verlassen niemals Ihr Telefon."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceAnalysisDesc to "Alle Bedrohungserkennung luft lokal auf Ihrem Gert. Keine Daten verlassen Ihr System."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceDBDesc to "Die gesamte Bedrohungssignatur-Datenbank wird auf Ihr Gert fr Millisekunden-Lookups heruntergeladen."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.OnboardingHeroDesc to "Mehr Guard verarbeitet jeden Scan mit sicherer On-Device-Analyse. Wir priorisieren erklrbare Sicherheit ohne Cloud-Telemetrie."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.ParanoiaModeDesc to "Maximaler Schutz. Blockiert alle verdchtigen Muster einschlielich neu registrierter Domains, ungewhnlicher TLDs und URLs mit potenziellen Kodierungstricks."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.PrivacyGuaranteeDesc to "Mehr Guard verwendet lokale heuristische Analyse-Engines. Keine Bilddaten, URL-Strings oder Metadaten verlassen dieses Gert whrend des Scans. Ihre Privatsphre ist mathematisch garantiert."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.SensitivityDescription to "Heuristische Schwellenwerte anpassen. Hhere Empfindlichkeit kann Fehlalarme erhhen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsDe.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictMinorConcernsDesc to "Einige kleinere Sicherheitsbedenken wurden identifiziert. Der Link scheint grtenteils sicher, aber eine berprfung wird empfohlen."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"+30-35 points Requires investigation of actual characters" to "+30-35 puntos: requiere investigacin de personajes reales"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"+30-40 points This is a primary phishing indicator" to "+30-40 puntos: este es un indicador principal de phishing"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"+40-50 points Advanced attack requiring intentional deception" to "+40-50 puntos: ataque avanzado que requiere engao intencional"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"3 hops detected involving known URL shorteners." to "Se detectaron 3 saltos que involucran acortadores de URL conocidos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"A shorter, cleaner URL would reduce this signal contribution by ~8 points." to "Una URL ms corta y ms limpia reducira esta contribucin de seal en aproximadamente 8 puntos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"AI-powered phishing detection running 100% offline in your browser." to "Deteccin de phishing impulsada por IA que se ejecuta 100% sin conexin en su navegador."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Adjust heuristic thresholds. Higher sensitivity may increase false positives." to "Ajustar los umbrales heursticos. Una mayor sensibilidad puede aumentar los falsos positivos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"All URLs will show as MALICIOUS for demo purposes" to "Todas las URL se mostrarn como MALICIOSAS para fines de demostracin."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"All code execution happens in an ephemeral container that is destroyed after each scan. This ensures malicious payloads can never escape to your system." to "Toda la ejecucin del cdigo ocurre en un contenedor efmero que se destruye despus de cada escaneo. Esto garantiza que las cargas tiles maliciosas nunca puedan escapar a su sistema."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Apple only uses apple.com for all account-related activities. Be wary of domains containing brand names but with different extensions." to "Apple slo utiliza apple.com para todas las actividades relacionadas con la cuenta. Tenga cuidado con los dominios que contienen nombres de marcas pero con diferentes extensiones."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Apple would never use a third-party domain for account verification. Check the actual domain name." to "Apple nunca utilizara un dominio de terceros para verificar la cuenta. Verifique el nombre de dominio real."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Are you sure you want to end this session? Progress will be lost." to "Ests seguro de que quieres finalizar esta sesin? Se perder el progreso."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Atlassian is a legitimate software company. Their primary domain atlassian.com is trustworthy." to "Atlassian es una empresa de software legtima. Su dominio principal atlassian.com es confiable."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Attackers create domains that look like trusted brands to steal credentials" to "Los atacantes crean dominios que parecen marcas confiables para robar credenciales"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Certificate Issuer matches domain owner (DigiCert Inc)." to "El emisor del certificado coincide con el propietario del dominio (DigiCert Inc)."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Certificate recently issued or self-signed. Proceed with caution." to "Certificado emitido recientemente o autofirmado. Proceda con precaucin."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Challenge Mehr Guard's offline AI engine. Can you spot phishing URLs faster than the bot?" to "Desafa al motor de IA sin conexin de Mehr Guard. Puedes detectar URLs de phishing ms rpido que el bot?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Challenge our offline AI engine. Can you spot the phish faster?" to "Desafa nuestro motor de IA fuera de lnea. Puedes detectar el phishing ms rpido?"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Characters like Cyrillic \"\" look identical to Latin \"a\" but are different" to "Caracteres como la \"\" cirlica parecen idnticos a la \"a\" latina pero son diferentes"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Check the domain carefully. This appears to be a well-known, trusted domain." to "Revisa el dominio cuidadosamente. Este parece ser un dominio confiable y conocido."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Code execution happens in an ephemeral container. Malicious payloads never touch your OS kernel." to "La ejecucin del cdigo ocurre en un contenedor efmero. Las cargas maliciosas nunca tocan el kernel de su sistema operativo."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Combined with other signals, suggests intent to steal credentials" to "Combinado con otras seales, sugiere la intencin de robar credenciales"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Complete analysis is performed locally. MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Cyrillic characters mimicking Latin alphabet detected." to "Caracteres cirlicos que imitan el alfabeto latino detectado."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Domain contains or mimics a known brand name (PayPal, Amazon, etc.)" to "El dominio contiene o imita una marca conocida (PayPal, Amazon, etc.)"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Domain registered > 5 years ago. Low probability of churn-and-burn." to "Dominio registrado hace > 5 aos. Baja probabilidad de abandono y quema."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Domain uses common misspellings or character substitutions (paypa1, amaz0n)" to "El dominio utiliza errores ortogrficos comunes o sustituciones de caracteres (paypa1, amaz0n)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Domain uses suspicious hyphenated structure (verify-deliveries.net)" to "El dominio utiliza una estructura con guiones sospechosa (verify-deliveries.net)"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Don't just get a \"Block\". We provide detailed heuristic breakdowns of URL parameters, redirects, and javascript payloads." to "No se limite a obtener un \"Bloquear\". Proporcionamos desgloses heursticos detallados de los parmetros de URL, redireccionamientos y cargas tiles de JavaScript."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Drag & drop a QR code image here or enable camera access to start scanning." to "Arrastre y suelte una imagen del cdigo QR aqu o habilite el acceso a la cmara para comenzar a escanear."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Exports include all identified threat vectors, headers, and the raw payload analysis." to "Las exportaciones incluyen todos los vectores de amenazas identificados, encabezados y el anlisis de carga til sin procesar."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"For the best experience, use Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge." to "Para obtener la mejor experiencia, use Chrome, Firefox, Safari o Edge."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Found in 3 local offline threat databases." to "Se encuentra en 3 bases de datos de amenazas locales fuera de lnea."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Free/cheap TLDs are heavily abused for throwaway phishing domains" to "Se abusa mucho de los TLD gratuitos/baratos para el phishing desechable dominios"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"GitHub.com is a legitimate developer platform owned by Microsoft. Always verify the exact domain spelling." to "GitHub.com es una plataforma de desarrollador legtima propiedad de Microsoft. Verifique siempre la ortografa exacta del dominio."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Google Docs uses docs.google.com. Always verify the sender knows you before opening shared documents." to "Google Docs utiliza docs.google.com. Verifique siempre que el remitente lo conozca antes de abrir documentos compartidos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Google services use subdomains of google.com. mail.google.com is the legitimate Gmail address." to "Los servicios de Google utilizan subdominios de google.com. mail.google.com es la direccin legtima de Gmail."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"High-confidence phishing detected. This URL exhibits multiple malicious indicators." to "phishing de alta confianza detectado. Esta URL muestra mltiples indicadores maliciosos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Homograph attack: \"c0mmonwealth\" uses zero instead of letter O" to "Ataque homgrafo: \"c0mmonwealth\" usa cero en lugar de la letra O"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Homograph attack: \"paypa1\" uses number 1 instead of letter L" to "Ataque homgrafo: \"paypa1\" usa el nmero 1 en lugar de la letra L"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Homograph attacks use similar-looking characters. Always check URLs character by character for suspicious substitutions." to "Ataques homgrafo Utilice personajes de apariencia similar. Siempre verifique las URL carcter por carcter para detectar sustituciones sospechosas."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"I am reporting a suspected phishing URL detected by Mehr Guard:" to "Estoy informando de una URL sospechosa de phishing detectada por Mehr Guard:"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If HTTPS was used, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~18 points." to "Si se usara HTTPS, esta seal no se activara y la puntuacin disminuira ~18 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If a registered domain name was used instead of IP address, score would drop by ~28 points." to "Si se usara un nombre de dominio registrado en lugar de una direccin IP, la puntuacin disminuira ~28 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If all characters were ASCII Latin letters, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~45 points." to "Si todos los caracteres fueran letras latinas ASCII, esta seal no se activara y la puntuacin disminuira ~45 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If no embedded URLs were present in query parameters, score would drop by ~18 points." to "Si no hubiera URL incrustadas en los parmetros de consulta, la puntuacin disminuira en ~18 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If only 1-2 subdomains were used, this signal would not trigger. Score would drop by ~12 points." to "Si solo se usaran 1 o 2 subdominios, esta seal no se activara. La puntuacin se reducira en ~12 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If the domain spelled the brand correctly without substitutions, score would drop by ~25 points." to "Si el dominio escribiera la marca correctamente sin sustituciones, la puntuacin se reducira en ~25 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If the domain used only ASCII characters (no IDN), score would drop by ~32 points." to "Si el dominio usara solo caracteres ASCII (sin IDN), la puntuacin se reducira en ~32 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If the domain used readable words instead of random characters, score would drop by ~12 points." to "Si el dominio usara palabras legibles en lugar de caracteres aleatorios, la puntuacin se reducira en ~12 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If the full destination URL was visible, score would drop by ~18 points (assuming destination is safe)." to "Si la URL de destino completa fuera visible, la puntuacin se reducira en ~18 puntos (suponiendo que el destino sea seguro)."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If this URL used .com, .org, or country TLDs, score would drop by ~25 points." to "Si esta URL usara .com, .org o TLD de pas, la puntuacin se reducira en ~25 puntos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"If this were the official brand domain (paypal.com), this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~35 points." to "Si este fuera el dominio oficial de la marca (paypal.com), esta seal no se activara y la puntuacin disminuira ~35 puntos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"International domains can hide malicious lookalike characters" to "Los dominios internacionales pueden ocultar caracteres maliciosos similares"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"LinkedIn uses linkedin.com as their primary domain. Profile URLs follow the /in/username format." to "LinkedIn utiliza linkedin.com como su dominio principal. Las URL del perfil siguen el formato /in/nombre de usuario."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Local database v2.4.1 active. No data leaves this device." to "Base de datos local v2.4.1 activa. No salen datos de este dispositivo."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Long URLs can hide malicious parameters or overwhelm users" to "Las URL largas pueden ocultar parmetros maliciosos o abrumar a los usuarios"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Look at the domain carefully. Is \"c0mmonwealth\" spelled correctly? The number 0 is often used to replace the letter O." to "Mire el dominio con atencin. Se escribe correctamente \"c0mmonwealth\"? El nmero 0 se utiliza a menudo para reemplazar la letra O."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Look at the domain name carefully. Is \"paypa1\" spelled correctly?" to "Mire el nombre de dominio con atencin. Est \"paypa1\" escrito correctamente?"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Look closely at the domain structure. Legitimate organisations rarely use hyphens in the main domain name or generic TLDs like" to "Mire de cerca la estructura del dominio. Las organizaciones legtimas rara vez usan guiones en el nombre de dominio principal o TLD genricos como"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Manage privacy controls, sensitivity, and security lists." to "Administre controles de privacidad, sensibilidad y listas de seguridad."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Maximum protection. Blocks any suspicious patterns including newly registered domains, uncommon TLDs, and any URL with potential encoding tricks." to "Mxima proteccin. Bloquea cualquier patrn sospechoso, incluidos dominios recin registrados, TLD poco comunes y cualquier URL con posibles trucos de codificacin."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Active Scanner - Real-time QR code scanning with AI-powered phishing detection." to "Escner activo de Mehr Guard: escaneo de cdigos QR en tiempo real con deteccin de phishing basada en IA."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Dashboard - Enterprise offline QR code security with explainable threat detection." to "Panel de Mehr Guard: seguridad de cdigos QR offline para empresas con deteccin de amenazas explicable."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Privacy Settings - 100% offline protection with zero cloud telemetry." to "Ajustes de privacidad de Mehr Guard: proteccin 100% offline sin telemetra en la nube."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Report Export - Generate and download threat analysis reports in PDF or JSON format." to "Exportacin de informes Mehr Guard: genera y descarga informes de anlisis de amenazas en formato PDF o JSON."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Threat Analysis - Detailed scan result showing attack breakdown and security recommendations." to "Anlisis de amenazas Mehr Guard: resultado detallado del escaneo con desglose de ataques y recomendaciones de seguridad."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Trust Centre - Manage privacy controls, detection sensitivity, and security lists." to "Centro de confianza de Mehr Guard: gestiona controles de privacidad, sensibilidad de deteccin y listas de seguridad."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard Web - AI-powered phishing detection running entirely in your browser. Scan and analyze URLs for security threats." to "Mehr Guard Web: deteccin de phishing con IA que se ejecuta completamente en tu navegador. Escanea y analiza URLs en busca de amenazas de seguridad."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard analyses potential threats directly on your hardware. Experience" to "Mehr Guard analiza amenazas potenciales directamente en su hardware. La experiencia"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard needs camera access to scan QR codes in real-time." to "Mehr Guard necesita acceso a la cmara para escanear cdigos QR en tiempo real."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard procesa cada escaneo dentro de una zona de pruebas local segura y aislada. Priorizamos la seguridad explicable con cero telemetra en la nube para el anlisis de imgenes."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard scan results - AI-powered phishing detection with detailed security analysis." to "Resultados de escaneo de Mehr Guard: deteccin de phishing con IA y anlisis de seguridad detallado."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard strictly disables all outgoing telemetry. Your scan results, URL history, and image hashes never leave your device." to "Mehr Guard desactiva estrictamente toda la telemetra saliente. Los resultados del escaneo, el historial de URL y los hashes de imgenes nunca salen de su dispositivo."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard uses local heuristic analysis engines. No image data, URL strings, or metadata leaves this device during scanning. Your privacy is mathematically guaranteed." to "Mehr Guard utiliza motores de anlisis heursticos locales. No salen datos de imgenes, cadenas de URL ni metadatos de este dispositivo durante el escaneo. Tu privacidad est matemticamente garantizada."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Mehr Guard works 100% offline! All analysis is done locally on your device. No internet connection required." to "Mehr Guard funciona 100% sin conexin. Todo el anlisis se realiza localmente en su dispositivo. No se requiere conexin a Internet."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"More than 3 subdomain levels (secure.login.paypal.fake.com)" to "Ms de 3 niveles de subdominio (secure.login.paypal.fake.com)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Need help? Visit our GitHub for documentation" to "Necesita ayuda? Visite nuestro GitHub para obtener documentacin"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Never trust shortened URLs from unknown sources. Use URL expander tools to see the real destination before clicking." to "Nunca confe en URL acortadas de fuentes desconocidas. Utilice herramientas de expansin de URL para ver el destino real antes de hacer clic."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"No security threats were detected. The QR code leads to a verified safe destination." to "No se detectaron amenazas de seguridad. El cdigo QR conduce a un destino seguro verificado."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Not found in 52 local offline threat databases." to "No se encuentra en 52 bases de datos de amenazas locales fuera de lnea."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Only blocks known malicious URLs from the threat database. Minimal false positives, but may miss novel attacks." to "Solo bloquea las URL maliciosas conocidas de la base de datos de amenazas. Falsos positivos mnimos, pero pueden pasar por alto ataques novedosos."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to "Optimizado para entornos de escritorio. Los escaneos se procesan en menos de 5 ms utilizando binarios multiplataforma nativos de Kotlin."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"PDF format. Best for sharing with stakeholders." to "Formato PDF. Lo mejor para compartir con las partes interesadas."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Privacy policy: 100% offline, zero data collection" to "Poltica de privacidad: 100% fuera de lnea, cero recopilacin de datos"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Randomly generated domains are often temporary phishing sites" to "Los dominios generados aleatoriamente suelen ser sitios de phishing temporales"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Removing or changing the suspicious pattern would reduce the overall risk score." to "Eliminar o cambiar el patrn sospechoso reducira el riesgo general puntuacin."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Scans for known malicious patterns and heuristic mismatches. Blocks homoglyph attacks and redirect chains. MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Share detection stats to improve ML." to "Compartir estadsticas de deteccin para mejorar el aprendizaje automtico."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$"Short URLs hide the actual destination. Prize claims from unknown numbers are almost always scams." to "Las URL cortas ocultan el destino real. Los reclamos de premios de nmeros desconocidos casi siempre son estafas."
