MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.AttackHomographExplain to "El dominio utiliza el cirlico '' (U+0430) en lugar del latino 'a' (U+0061). Esta tcnica se utiliza comnmente para engaar a los usuarios hacindoles creer que estn visitando un servicio legtimo."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.BalancedModeDesc to "Busca patrones maliciosos conocidos y discrepancias heursticas. Bloquea ataques de homgrafos y cadenas de redireccin."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.CameraAccessDescription to "Arrastra una imagen de cdigo QR aqu o habilita el acceso a la cmara para comenzar a escanear."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ConfusableCharsDesc to "El dominio contiene caracteres que se parecen a letras comunes (ej. '' vs 'a')."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.DangerousWarning to "Esta URL ha sido marcada como potencialmente peligrosa. Abrirla puede exponerlo a phishing, malware u otras amenazas de seguridad. Est seguro de que desea continuar?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.DoNotVisitDesc to "Phishing de alta confianza detectado. Esta URL muestra mltiples indicadores maliciosos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.DomainUsesInternationalChars to "Este dominio usa caracteres internacionales que pueden imitar dominios legtimos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ExportInfoNote to "Las exportaciones incluyen todos los vectores de amenaza identificados y el anlisis de carga til."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureExplainableDesc to "No obtenga solo un \"Bloqueo\". Proporcionamos desgloses heursticos detallados de parmetros URL, redirecciones y cargas tiles de Javascript."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureOfflineDesc to "El anlisis completo se realiza localmente. Su transmisin de cmara y datos escaneados nunca tocan un servidor externo, garantizando privacidad absoluta."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.FeaturePerformanceDesc to "Optimizado para entornos de escritorio. Los escaneos se procesan en menos de 5ms utilizando binarios nativos de Kotlin Multiplatform."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.HeroDescription to "Mehr Guard analiza amenazas potenciales directamente en su hardware. Experimente proteccin sin latencia."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.HeuristicAnalysisDesc to "URL marcada segn mltiples factores de riesgo detectados por el motor de anlisis."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.LowSensitivityModeDesc to "Solo bloquea URLs maliciosas conocidas de la base de datos de amenazas. Mnimos falsos positivos, pero puede perder ataques nuevos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.MetaOfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Esta imagen fue analizada localmente en su dispositivo. No se enviaron datos a la nube para este veredicto."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.MixedScriptAttackDesc to "El dominio contiene caracteres de mltiples scripts (ej. Cirlico + Latino). Comn en ataques homgrafos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.NoCloudLogsDesc to "Deshabilitamos estrictamente la telemetra saliente para escaneos. Los resultados y hashes permanecen locales."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.NoScanDataResults to "No hay datos de escaneo disponibles. Escanee una URL para ver los resultados del anlisis."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.OfflineGuaranteeDesc to "El anlisis de Mehr Guard se ejecuta completamente en el Neural Engine de su dispositivo. Los datos de URL nunca salen de su telfono."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceAnalysisDesc to "Toda la deteccin de amenazas se ejecuta localmente en tu dispositivo. Ningn dato sale de tu sistema."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceDBDesc to "La base de datos completa de firmas de amenazas se descarga a tu dispositivo para bsquedas en milisegundos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.OnboardingHeroDesc to "Mehr Guard procesa cada escaneo con anlisis seguro en el dispositivo. Priorizamos la seguridad explicable sin telemetra en la nube."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ParanoiaModeDesc to "Proteccin mxima. Bloquea cualquier patrn sospechoso incluyendo dominios recin registrados, TLDs poco comunes y cualquier URL con posibles trucos de codificacin."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.PrivacyGuaranteeDesc to "Mehr Guard utiliza motores de anlisis heurstico locales. Ningn dato de imagen, cadena de URL o metadatos abandona este dispositivo durante el escaneo. Su privacidad est matemticamente garantizada."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ProceedWithCautionDesc to "Se detectaron algunos indicadores sospechosos. Verifique la fuente antes de ingresar informacin sensible."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonAtSymbolInjectionDesc to "La URL contiene el smbolo @ indicando posible intento de robo de credenciales"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonBrandInSubdomainDesc to "El nombre de la marca aparece en el subdominio pero no en el dominio principal"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonCredentialParamDesc to "La URL contiene parmetros relacionados con credenciales (contrasea, token, etc.)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonDomainAgePatternDesc to "El nombre de dominio coincide con patrones de dominios generados automticamente"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonHomographDesc to "El nombre de dominio internacionalizado (IDN) puede estar suplantando otro dominio"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonMixedScriptDesc to "El nombre de host contiene caracteres de diferentes scripts (posible suplantacin)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonSuspiciousPathDesc to "La ruta contiene palabras clave sospechosas (inicio de sesin, verificar, etc.)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonZeroWidthCharsDesc to "Caracteres Unicode ocultos de ancho cero detectados (intento de ofuscacin)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.ResetConfirm to "Esto restablecer todas las configuraciones del Centro de Confianza a los valores predeterminados."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.RestrictedDesc to "Esta URL ha sido marcada como potencialmente peligrosa. Revise el anlisis a continuacin antes de continuar."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.SafeToVisitDesc to "Verificado por heursticas locales v2.4. No se encontraron patrones de phishing, scripts ofuscados ni coincidencias de lista negra."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.SensitivityDescription to "Ajusta umbrales heursticos. Mayor sensibilidad puede aumentar falsos positivos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.SettingsSavedAutomatically to "Los ajustes se guardan automticamente y se sincronizan entre sesiones."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.SignalLongUrlMarketing to "URL inusualmente larga ({length} caracteres) - contiene parmetros de marketing"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictDangerousDesc to "El cdigo QR escaneado contiene indicadores maliciosos asociados con phishing y robo de credenciales. No contine a la URL de destino."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictMinorConcernsDesc to "Se identificaron algunas preocupaciones de seguridad menores. El enlace parece mayormente seguro pero se recomienda revisar."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictNoActivityDesc to "No hay datos de escaneo disponibles. Por favor escanee un cdigo QR o ingrese una URL para analizar."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictSuspiciousDesc to "El cdigo QR escaneado muestra patrones sospechosos que pueden indicar riesgos de seguridad potenciales. Proceda con precaucin."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictVerifiedSafeDesc to "No se detectaron amenazas de seguridad. El cdigo QR lleva a un destino seguro verificado."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsEs.kt$WebStringKey.VotingExplanation to "El voto mayoritario determina el veredicto: 3+ SEGURO = verde, 2+ MALICIOSO = rojo"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"+25-30 points Strong phishing indicator" to "+30-35 points Ncessite une enqute sur la ralit relle caractres"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"+30-35 points Requires investigation of actual characters" to "+30-40 points Il s'agit d'un indicateur principal de phishing"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"+30-40 points This is a primary phishing indicator" to "+40-50 points Attaque avance ncessitant une tromperie intentionnelle"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"A phishing attempt was successfully blocked" to "Une URL plus courte et plus propre rduirait cette contribution de signal d'environ 8 points."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"AI-powered phishing detection running 100% offline in your browser." to "Dtection de phishing base sur l'IA qui s'excute"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Added {domain} to {list}" to "Ajuster les seuils heuristiques. Une sensibilit plus leve peut augmenter les faux positifs."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"All URLs will show as MALICIOUS for demo purposes" to "Toute l'excution de code se produit dans un conteneur phmre qui est dtruit aprs chaque analyse. Cela garantit que les charges utiles malveillantes ne pourront jamais s'chapper vers votre systme."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"All code execution happens in an ephemeral container that is destroyed after each scan. This ensures malicious payloads can never escape to your system." to "Toutes les notifications marques comme lues"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Apple only uses apple.com for all account-related activities. Be wary of domains containing brand names but with different extensions." to "Apple utilise uniquement apple.com pour toutes les activits lies au compte. Mfiez-vous des domaines contenant des noms de marque mais avec des extensions diffrentes."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Apple would never use a third-party domain for account verification. Check the actual domain name." to "Apple n'utilisera jamais un domaine tiers pour la vrification du compte. Vrifiez le nom de domaine actuel."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Are you sure you want to end this session? Progress will be lost." to "tes-vous sr de vouloir mettre fin cette session? Les progrs seront perdus."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Atlassian is a legitimate software company. Their primary domain atlassian.com is trustworthy." to "Atlassian est une socit de logiciels lgitime. Leur domaine principal atlassian.com est digne de confiance."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Attackers create domains that look like trusted brands to steal credentials" to "Les attaquants crent des domaines qui ressemblent des marques de confiance pour voler des informations d'identification"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Can redirect through tracking or to malicious destinations" to "Peut rediriger via le suivi ou vers des destinations malveillantes"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Certificate Issuer matches domain owner (DigiCert Inc)" to "L'metteur du certificat correspond au propritaire du domaine (DigiCert Inc)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Certificate Issuer matches domain owner (DigiCert Inc)." to "L'metteur du certificat correspond au propritaire du domaine (DigiCert Inc)."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Certificate issued by DigiCert Inc. No anomalies in chain of trust." to "Certificat mis par DigiCert Inc. Aucune anomalie dans la chane de confiance."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Certificate issued by trusted CA. No anomalies in chain of trust." to "Certificat dlivr par une autorit de certification de confiance. Aucune anomalie dans la chane de confiance."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Certificate recently issued or self-signed. Proceed with caution." to "Certificat rcemment dlivr ou auto-sign. Procdez avec prudence."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Challenge Mehr Guard's offline AI engine. Can you spot phishing URLs faster than the bot?" to "Dfiez le moteur IA hors ligne de Mehr Guard. Pouvez-vous reprer les URL de phishing plus vite que le bot ?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Challenge our offline AI engine. Can you spot the phish faster?" to "Dfiez notre moteur d'IA hors ligne. Pouvez-vous reprer le phishing plus rapidement?"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Characters like Cyrillic \"\" look identical to Latin \"a\" but are different" to "Les caractres comme le \"\" cyrillique sont identiques au \"a\" latin mais sont diffrents"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Check the domain carefully. This appears to be a well-known, trusted domain." to "Vrifiez soigneusement le domaine. Il semble qu'il s'agisse d'un domaine de confiance bien connu."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Code execution happens in an ephemeral container. Malicious payloads never touch your OS kernel." to "L'excution du code se produit dans un conteneur phmre. Les charges utiles malveillantes ne touchent jamais le noyau de votre systme d'exploitation."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Combined with other signals, suggests intent to steal credentials" to "Combin d'autres signaux, suggre une intention de voler des informations d'identification"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Complete analysis is performed locally. Your camera feed and scanned data never touch an external server, ensuring absolute privacy." to "L'analyse complte est effectue localement. Le flux de votre camra et les donnes numrises ne touchent jamais un serveur externe, garantissant ainsi une confidentialit absolue."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Configure formats and download your threat analysis." to "Configurez les formats et tlchargez votre analyse des menaces."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Cyrillic characters mimicking Latin alphabet detected." to "Caractres cyrilliques imitant l'alphabet latin dtect."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Deep subdomains can hide the actual domain at the end" to "Les sous-domaines profonds peuvent masquer le domaine rel la fin"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Destination URL obfuscated. Unable to verify final target." to "URL de destination obscurcie. Impossible de vrifier la cible finale."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Domain contains or mimics a known brand name (PayPal, Amazon, etc.)" to "Le domaine contient ou imite un nom de marque connu (PayPal, Amazon, etc.)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Domain mimics known brand (PayPal Paypa1). High-confidence phishing." to "Le domaine imite une marque connue (PayPal Paypa1). Phishing haute confiance."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Domain or path contains random-looking character sequences" to "Le domaine ou le chemin contient des squences de caractres alatoires"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Domain registered > 5 years ago. Low probability of churn-and-burn." to "Domaine enregistr il y a plus de 5ans. Faible probabilit de dsabonnement."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Domain uses common misspellings or character substitutions (paypa1, amaz0n)" to "Le domaine utilise des fautes d'orthographe courantes ou des substitutions de caractres (paypa1, amaz0n)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Domain uses suspicious hyphenated structure (verify-deliveries.net)" to "Le domaine utilise une structure avec trait d'union suspecte (verify-deliveries.net)"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Don't just get a \"Block\". We provide detailed heuristic breakdowns of URL parameters, redirects, and javascript payloads." to "Ne vous contentez pas d'obtenir un \"blocage\". Nous fournissons des analyses heuristiques dtailles des paramtres d'URL, des redirections et des charges utiles javascript."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Drag & drop a QR code image here or enable camera access to start scanning." to "Faites glisser et dposez une image de code QR ici ou activez l'accs la camra pour lancer la numrisation."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Exports include all identified threat vectors, headers, and the raw payload analysis." to "Les exportations incluent tous les vecteurs de menaces identifis, les en-ttes et l'analyse brute de la charge utile."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"For the best experience, use Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge." to "Pour une exprience optimale, utilisez Chrome, Firefox, Safari ou Edge."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Free/cheap TLDs are heavily abused for throwaway phishing domains" to "Les TLD gratuits/bon march sont fortement utiliss pour les domaines de phishing jetables"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"GitHub.com is a legitimate developer platform owned by Microsoft. Always verify the exact domain spelling." to "GitHub.com est une plate-forme de dveloppement lgitime appartenant Microsoft. Vrifiez toujours l'orthographe exacte du domaine."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Google Docs uses docs.google.com. Always verify the sender knows you before opening shared documents." to "Google Docs utilise docs.google.com. Vrifiez toujours que l'expditeur vous connat avant d'ouvrir des documents partags."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Google services use subdomains of google.com. mail.google.com is the legitimate Gmail address." to "Les services Google utilisent les sous-domaines de google.com. mail.google.com est l'adresse Gmail lgitime."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"High-confidence phishing detected. This URL exhibits multiple malicious indicators." to "Phishing haute confiance dtect. Cette URL prsente plusieurs indicateurs malveillants."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Homograph attack: \"c0mmonwealth\" uses zero instead of letter O" to "Attaque homographe: \"c0mmonwealth\" utilise zro au lieu de la lettre O"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Homograph attack: \"paypa1\" uses number 1 instead of letter L" to "Attaque homographe: \"paypa1\" utilise le numro 1 au lieu de la lettre L"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Homograph attacks use similar-looking characters. Always check URLs character by character for suspicious substitutions." to "Attaques homographes utilisez des caractres similaires. Vrifiez toujours les URL caractre par caractre pour dtecter les substitutions suspectes."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"How aggressive should threat detection be?" to "Dans quelle mesure la dtection des menaces doit-elle tre agressive?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"I am reporting a suspected phishing URL detected by Mehr Guard:" to "Je signale une URL suspecte de phishing dtecte par [[MARQUE]]:"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If HTTPS was used, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~18 points." to "Si HTTPS tait utilis, ce signal ne se dclencherait pas et le score chuterait d'environ 18 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If a registered domain name was used instead of IP address, score would drop by ~28 points." to "Si un nom de domaine enregistr tait utilis la place d'une adresse IP, le score chuterait d'environ 28 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If all characters were ASCII Latin letters, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~45 points." to "Si tous les caractres taient des lettres latines ASCII, ce signal ne se dclencherait pas et le score diminuerait ~45 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If no embedded URLs were present in query parameters, score would drop by ~18 points." to "Si aucune URL intgre n'tait prsente dans les paramtres de requte, le score chuterait d'environ 18 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If only 1-2 subdomains were used, this signal would not trigger. Score would drop by ~12 points." to "Si seulement 1 2 sous-domaines taient utiliss, ce signal ne se dclencherait pas. Le score diminuerait d'environ 12 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If the domain spelled the brand correctly without substitutions, score would drop by ~25 points." to "Si le domaine pelait correctement la marque sans substitutions, le score diminuerait d'environ 25 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If the domain used only ASCII characters (no IDN), score would drop by ~32 points." to "Si le domaine utilisait uniquement des caractres ASCII (pas d'IDN), le score diminuerait d'environ 32 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If the domain used readable words instead of random characters, score would drop by ~12 points." to "Si le domaine utilisait des mots lisibles au lieu de caractres alatoires, le score diminuerait d'environ 12 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If the full destination URL was visible, score would drop by ~18 points (assuming destination is safe)." to "Si l'URL de destination complte tait visible, le score diminuerait d'environ 18 points (en supposant que la destination soit sre)."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If this URL used .com, .org, or country TLDs, score would drop by ~25 points." to "Si cette URL utilisait des TLD .com, .org ou nationaux, le score diminuerait d'environ 25 points."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"If this were the official brand domain (paypal.com), this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~35 points." to "S'il s'agissait du domaine officiel de la marque (paypal.com), ce signal ne se dclencherait pas et le score chuterait d'environ 35 points."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"International domains can hide malicious lookalike characters" to "Les domaines internationaux peuvent masquer des caractres similaires malveillants"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Learn how to identify advanced QR homograph attacks." to "Apprenez identifier les attaques avances d'homographes QR."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Legitimate services use domains; IPs hide identity and bypass filters" to "Les services lgitimes utilisent des domaines; Les adresses IP masquent les filtres d'identit et contournent les filtres"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"LinkedIn uses linkedin.com as their primary domain. Profile URLs follow the /in/username format." to "LinkedIn utilise linkedin.com comme domaine principal. Les URL de profil suivent le format /in/username."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Local database v2.4.1 active. No data leaves this device." to "Base de donnes locale v2.4.1 active. Aucune donne ne quitte cet appareil."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Long URLs can hide malicious parameters or overwhelm users" to "Les URL longues peuvent masquer des paramtres malveillants ou submerger les utilisateurs"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsFr.kt$"Look at the domain carefully. Is \"c0mmonwealth\" spelled correctly? The number 0 is often used to replace the letter O." to "Examinez attentivement le domaine. \"C0mmonwealth\" est-il correctement orthographi? Le chiffre 0 est souvent utilis pour remplacer la lettre O."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.AttackHomographExplain to "Domain menggunakan '' Sirilik (U+0430) bukan 'a' Latin (U+0061). Teknik ini biasanya digunakan untuk mengelabui pengguna agar percaya bahwa mereka mengunjungi layanan yang sah."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.CameraAccessDescription to "Seret & lepas gambar kode QR di sini atau aktifkan akses kamera untuk mulai memindai."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.DangerousWarning to "URL ini telah ditandai sebagai berpotensi berbahaya. Membukanya dapat membuat Anda terpapar phishing, malware, atau ancaman keamanan lainnya. Apakah Anda yakin ingin melanjutkan?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.DoNotVisitDesc to "Phishing kepercayaan tinggi terdeteksi. URL ini menunjukkan beberapa indikator berbahaya."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.DomainUsesInternationalChars to "Domain ini menggunakan karakter internasional yang mungkin meniru domain yang sah."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureExplainableDesc to "Jangan hanya mendapat \"Blokir\". Kami menyediakan analisis heuristik terperinci dari parameter URL, redirect, dan payload JavaScript."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureOfflineDesc to "Analisis lengkap dilakukan secara lokal. Feed kamera dan data yang dipindai tidak pernah menyentuh server eksternal, memastikan privasi mutlak."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.FeaturePerformanceDesc to "Dioptimalkan untuk lingkungan desktop. Pemindaian diproses dalam waktu kurang dari 5ms menggunakan biner Kotlin Multiplatform native."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.HeroDescription to "Mehr Guard menganalisis ancaman potensial langsung di perangkat keras Anda. Nikmati perlindungan tanpa latensi."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.HeuristicAnalysisDesc to "URL ditandai berdasarkan beberapa faktor risiko yang terdeteksi oleh mesin analisis."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.LowSensitivityModeDesc to "Hanya memblokir URL berbahaya yang diketahui dari database ancaman. Minimal false positive, tetapi mungkin melewatkan serangan baru."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.MetaOfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Gambar ini dianalisis secara lokal di perangkat Anda. Tidak ada data yang dikirim ke cloud untuk putusan ini."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.MixedScriptAttackDesc to "Domain berisi karakter dari beberapa script (mis. Sirilik + Latin). Umum dalam serangan homograf."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.NoScanDataResults to "Tidak ada data pemindaian tersedia. Silakan pindai URL untuk melihat hasil analisis."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.OfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Analisis Mehr Guard berjalan sepenuhnya di Neural Engine perangkat Anda. Data URL tidak pernah meninggalkan ponsel Anda."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.ParanoiaModeDesc to "Perlindungan maksimal. Memblokir pola mencurigakan apa pun termasuk domain yang baru terdaftar, TLD yang tidak umum, dan URL apa pun dengan trik encoding potensial."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.PrivacyGuaranteeDesc to "Mehr Guard menggunakan mesin analisis heuristik lokal. Tidak ada data gambar, string URL, atau metadata yang meninggalkan perangkat ini selama pemindaian. Privasi Anda dijamin secara matematis."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.ProceedWithCautionDesc to "Beberapa indikator mencurigakan terdeteksi. Verifikasi sumber sebelum memasukkan informasi sensitif."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonAtSymbolInjectionDesc to "URL mengandung simbol @ menunjukkan kemungkinan upaya pencurian kredensial"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.RestrictedDesc to "URL ini telah ditandai sebagai berpotensi berbahaya. Tinjau analisis di bawah sebelum melanjutkan."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.SafeToVisitDesc to "Diverifikasi oleh heuristik lokal v2.4. Tidak ditemukan pola phishing, skrip tersembunyi, atau kecocokan daftar hitam."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictMinorConcernsDesc to "Beberapa kekhawatiran keamanan kecil teridentifikasi. Tautan tampak sebagian besar aman tetapi disarankan untuk ditinjau."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIn.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictVerifiedSafeDesc to "Tidak ada ancaman keamanan yang terdeteksi. Kode QR mengarah ke tujuan aman yang terverifikasi."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.AttackHomographExplain to "Il dominio usa il cirillico '' (U+0430) invece del latino 'a' (U+0061). Questa tecnica comunemente usata per ingannare gli utenti facendogli credere di visitare un servizio legittimo."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.BalancedModeDesc to "Cerca pattern malevoli noti e incongruenze euristiche. Blocca attacchi omoglifi e catene di redirect."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.CameraAccessDescription to "Trascina e rilascia un'immagine con codice QR qui o abilita l'accesso alla fotocamera per iniziare la scansione."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.DangerousWarning to "Questo URL stato segnalato come potenzialmente pericoloso. Aprirlo potrebbe esporti a phishing, malware o altre minacce alla sicurezza. Sei sicuro di voler procedere?"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.DoNotVisitDesc to "Phishing ad alta affidabilit rilevato. Questo URL mostra molteplici indicatori malevoli."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.DomainUsesInternationalChars to "Questo dominio utilizza caratteri internazionali che potrebbero imitare domini legittimi."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.ExportInfoNote to "Le esportazioni includono tutti i vettori di minaccia identificati e l'analisi del payload."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureExplainableDesc to "Non ricevere solo un \"Blocco\". Forniamo analisi euristiche dettagliate di parametri URL, reindirizzamenti e payload JavaScript."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.FeatureOfflineDesc to "L'analisi completa viene eseguita localmente. I dati della fotocamera e i dati scansionati non toccano mai un server esterno, garantendo privacy assoluta."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.FeaturePerformanceDesc to "Ottimizzato per ambienti desktop. Le scansioni vengono elaborate in meno di 5ms utilizzando binari nativi Kotlin Multiplatform."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.HeroDescription to "Mehr Guard analizza le potenziali minacce direttamente sul tuo hardware. Goditi una protezione a latenza zero."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.HeuristicAnalysisDesc to "URL contrassegnato in base a molteplici fattori di rischio rilevati dal motore di analisi."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.IdnPunycodeDomainDesc to "Questo dominio utilizza caratteri internazionalizzati. Visualizzazione sicura:"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.LowSensitivityModeDesc to "Blocca solo URL malevoli noti dal database delle minacce. Minimi falsi positivi, ma potrebbe perdere nuovi attacchi."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.MetaOfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Questa immagine stata analizzata localmente sul tuo dispositivo. Nessun dato stato inviato al cloud per questo verdetto."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.MixedScriptAttackDesc to "Il dominio contiene caratteri da pi script (es. Cirillico + Latino). Comune negli attacchi omografi."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.NoCloudLogsDesc to "Disabilitiamo rigorosamente la telemetria in uscita per le scansioni. I risultati e gli hash restano locali."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.NoScanDataResults to "Nessun dato di scansione disponibile. Esegui la scansione di un URL per vedere i risultati dell'analisi."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.OfflineGuaranteeDesc to "L'analisi di Mehr Guard viene eseguita interamente sul Neural Engine del tuo dispositivo. I dati URL non lasciano mai il tuo telefono."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.OfflineSecurityDesc to "I tuoi dati non lasciano mai questo dispositivo. Tutta l'elaborazione locale."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceAnalysisDesc to "Tutto il rilevamento minacce viene eseguito localmente sul tuo dispositivo. Nessun dato lascia il tuo sistema."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceDBDesc to "L'intero database delle firme minacce viene scaricato sul tuo dispositivo per ricerche in millisecondi."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.OnboardingHeroDesc to "Mehr Guard elabora ogni scansione con analisi sicura sul dispositivo. Diamo priorit alla sicurezza spiegabile senza telemetria cloud."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.ParanoiaModeDesc to "Protezione massima. Blocca qualsiasi pattern sospetto inclusi domini appena registrati, TLD non comuni e qualsiasi URL con potenziali trucchi di codifica."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsIt.kt$WebStringKey.PrivacyGuaranteeDesc to "Mehr Guard utilizza motori di analisi euristica locali. Nessun dato immagine, stringa URL o metadati lascia questo dispositivo durante la scansione. La tua privacy matematicamente garantita."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"A shorter, cleaner URL would reduce this signal contribution by ~8 points." to " URL 8 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Adjust heuristic thresholds. Higher sensitivity may increase false positives." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"All code execution happens in an ephemeral container that is destroyed after each scan. This ensures malicious payloads can never escape to your system." to ""

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Check the domain carefully. This appears to be a well-known, trusted domain." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Code execution happens in an ephemeral container. Malicious payloads never touch your OS kernel." to " OS "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Don't just get a \"Block\". We provide detailed heuristic breakdowns of URL parameters, redirects, and javascript payloads." to " URL JavaScript "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Active Scanner - Real-time QR code scanning with AI-powered phishing detection." to "Mehr Guard AIQR"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Dashboard - Enterprise offline QR code security with explainable threat detection." to "Mehr Guard QR"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Privacy Settings - 100% offline protection with zero cloud telemetry." to "Mehr Guard 100%"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Report Export - Generate and download threat analysis reports in PDF or JSON format." to "Mehr Guard PDF JSON "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Threat Analysis - Detailed scan result showing attack breakdown and security recommendations." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Trust Centre - Manage privacy controls, detection sensitivity, and security lists." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard Web - AI-powered phishing detection running entirely in your browser. Scan and analyze URLs for security threats." to "Mehr Guard Web AIURL"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard analyses potential threats directly on your hardware. Experience" to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard needs camera access to scan QR codes in real-time." to "Mehr Guard QR "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard scan results - AI-powered phishing detection with detailed security analysis." to "Mehr Guard AI"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard strictly disables all outgoing telemetry. Your scan results, URL history, and image hashes never leave your device." to "Mehr Guard URL "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard uses local heuristic analysis engines. No image data, URL strings, or metadata leaves this device during scanning. Your privacy is mathematically guaranteed." to "Mehr Guard URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Mehr Guard works 100% offline! All analysis is done locally on your device. No internet connection required." to "Mehr Guard 100% !"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Never trust shortened URLs from unknown sources. Use URL expander tools to see the real destination before clicking." to " URL URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"No security threats were detected. The QR code leads to a verified safe destination." to " QR "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Official postal services use their primary domain (auspost.com.au) for all tracking. Verify by visiting the official website directly." to " (auspost.com.au) Web "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Only blocks known malicious URLs from the threat database. Minimal false positives, but may miss novel attacks." to " URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to " Kotlin 5 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Removing or changing the suspicious pattern would reduce the overall risk score." to " "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsJa.kt$"Scans for known malicious patterns and heuristic mismatches. Blocks homoglyph attacks and redirect chains. Low false positive rate expected." to " "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.MetaOfflineGuaranteeDesc to "Esta imagem foi analisada localmente no seu dispositivo. Nenhum dado foi enviado para a nuvem para este veredito."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.NoCloudLogsDesc to "Desabilitamos rigorosamente a telemetria de sada para varreduras. Os resultados e hashes permanecem locais."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.NoScanDataResults to "Nenhum dado de verificao disponvel. Por favor, verifique uma URL para ver os resultados da anlise."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.OfflineGuaranteeDesc to "A anlise do Mehr Guard executada inteiramente no Neural Engine do seu dispositivo. Os dados de URL nunca saem do seu telefone."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceAnalysisDesc to "Toda a deteco de ameaas executada localmente no seu dispositivo. Nenhum dado sai do seu sistema."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.OnDeviceDBDesc to "O database completo de assinaturas de ameaas baixado para seu dispositivo para buscas em milissegundos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.OnboardingHeroDesc to "Mehr Guard processa cada varredura com anlise segura no dispositivo. Priorizamos segurana explicvel sem telemetria na nuvem."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.ParanoiaModeDesc to "Proteo mxima. Bloqueia qualquer padro suspeito incluindo domnios recm-registrados, TLDs incomuns e qualquer URL com possveis truques de codificao."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.PrivacyGuaranteeDesc to "Mehr Guard usa motores de anlise heurstica locais. Nenhum dado de imagem, string de URL ou metadados sai deste dispositivo durante a verificao. Sua privacidade matematicamente garantida."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.ProceedWithCautionDesc to "Alguns indicadores suspeitos detectados. Verifique a fonte antes de inserir informaes sensveis."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonAtSymbolInjectionDesc to "URL contm smbolo @ indicando possvel tentativa de roubo de credenciais"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonDomainAgePatternDesc to "Nome de domnio corresponde a padres de domnios gerados automaticamente"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.ReasonZeroWidthCharsDesc to "Caracteres Unicode ocultos de largura zero detectados (tentativa de ofuscao)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.RestrictedDesc to "Esta URL foi marcada como potencialmente perigosa. Revise a anlise abaixo antes de prosseguir."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.SafeToVisitDesc to "Verificado por heursticas locais v2.4. Nenhum padro de phishing, script ofuscado ou correspondncia de lista negra encontrado."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.SensitivityDescription to "Ajuste os limiares heursticos. Maior sensibilidade pode aumentar falsos positivos."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.SettingsSavedAutomatically to "As configuraes so salvas automaticamente e sincronizadas entre sesses."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.SignalLongUrlMarketing to "URL incomumente longa ({length} caracteres) - contm parmetros de marketing"

MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictDangerousDesc to "O cdigo QR escaneado contm indicadores maliciosos associados a phishing e coleta de credenciais. No prossiga para a URL de destino."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictMinorConcernsDesc to "Algumas preocupaes de segurana menores foram identificadas. O link parece principalmente seguro, mas recomenda-se reviso."
MaxLineLength:WebStringsPt.kt$WebStringKey.VerdictNoActivityDesc to "Nenhum dado de escaneamento disponvel. Escaneie um cdigo QR ou insira uma URL para analisar."

MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"All code execution happens in an ephemeral container that is destroyed after each scan. This ensures malicious payloads can never escape to your system." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Apple only uses apple.com for all account-related activities. Be wary of domains containing brand names but with different extensions." to "Apple apple.com "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Apple would never use a third-party domain for account verification. Check the actual domain name." to "Apple "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Atlassian is a legitimate software company. Their primary domain atlassian.com is trustworthy." to "Atlassian atlassian.com "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Challenge Mehr Guard's offline AI engine. Can you spot phishing URLs faster than the bot?" to " Mehr Guard AI URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Characters like Cyrillic \"\" look identical to Latin \"a\" but are different" to "a"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Code execution happens in an ephemeral container. Malicious payloads never touch your OS kernel." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Complete analysis is performed locally. Your camera feed and scanned data never touch an external server, ensuring absolute privacy." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Don't just get a \"Block\". We provide detailed heuristic breakdowns of URL parameters, redirects, and javascript payloads." to " URL JavaScript "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Exports include all identified threat vectors, headers, and the raw payload analysis." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"GitHub.com is a legitimate developer platform owned by Microsoft. Always verify the exact domain spelling." to "GitHub.com Microsoft "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Google Docs uses docs.google.com. Always verify the sender knows you before opening shared documents." to "Google docs.google.com"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Google services use subdomains of google.com. mail.google.com is the legitimate Gmail address." to "Google google.com mail.google.com Gmail "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"High-confidence phishing detected. This URL exhibits multiple malicious indicators." to " URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Homograph attacks use similar-looking characters. Always check URLs character by character for suspicious substitutions." to " URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If HTTPS was used, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~18 points." to " HTTPS 18 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If a registered domain name was used instead of IP address, score would drop by ~28 points." to " IP 28 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If all characters were ASCII Latin letters, this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~45 points." to " ASCII 45 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If no embedded URLs were present in query parameters, score would drop by ~18 points." to " URL 18 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If only 1-2 subdomains were used, this signal would not trigger. Score would drop by ~12 points." to "1-2 12 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If the domain spelled the brand correctly without substitutions, score would drop by ~25 points." to " 25 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If the domain used only ASCII characters (no IDN), score would drop by ~32 points." to " ASCII IDN 32 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If the domain used readable words instead of random characters, score would drop by ~12 points." to " 12 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If the full destination URL was visible, score would drop by ~18 points (assuming destination is safe)." to " URL 18 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If this URL used .com, .org, or country TLDs, score would drop by ~25 points." to " URL .com.org / TLD 25 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"If this were the official brand domain (paypal.com), this signal would not trigger and score would drop by ~35 points." to " (paypal.com) 35 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"LinkedIn uses linkedin.com as their primary domain. Profile URLs follow the /in/username format." to "LinkedIn linkedin.com URL /in/"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Look at the domain carefully. Is \"c0mmonwealth\" spelled correctly? The number 0 is often used to replace the letter O." to " c0mmonwealth0O"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Look closely at the domain structure. Legitimate organisations rarely use hyphens in the main domain name or generic TLDs like" to " TLD "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Maximum protection. Blocks any suspicious patterns including newly registered domains, uncommon TLDs, and any URL with potential encoding tricks." to " TLD URL"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Active Scanner - Real-time QR code scanning with AI-powered phishing detection." to "Mehr Guard AI "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Dashboard - Enterprise offline QR code security with explainable threat detection." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Privacy Settings - 100% offline protection with zero cloud telemetry." to "Mehr Guard 100% "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Report Export - Generate and download threat analysis reports in PDF or JSON format." to "Mehr Guard PDF JSON "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Threat Analysis - Detailed scan result showing attack breakdown and security recommendations." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Trust Centre - Manage privacy controls, detection sensitivity, and security lists." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard Web - AI-powered phishing detection running entirely in your browser. Scan and analyze URLs for security threats." to "Mehr Guard Web AI URL "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard processes every scan within a secure, isolated local sandbox. We prioritize explainable security with zero cloud telemetry for image analysis." to "Mehr Guard "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard scan results - AI-powered phishing detection with detailed security analysis." to "Mehr Guard AI "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard strictly disables all outgoing telemetry. Your scan results, URL history, and image hashes never leave your device." to "Mehr Guard URL "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard uses local heuristic analysis engines. No image data, URL strings, or metadata leaves this device during scanning. Your privacy is mathematically guaranteed." to "Mehr Guard URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Mehr Guard works 100% offline! All analysis is done locally on your device. No internet connection required." to "[[]] 100% "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Never trust shortened URLs from unknown sources. Use URL expander tools to see the real destination before clicking." to " URL URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"No security threats were detected. The QR code leads to a verified safe destination." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Official postal services use their primary domain (auspost.com.au) for all tracking. Verify by visiting the official website directly." to " (auspost.com.au) "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Only blocks known malicious URLs from the threat database. Minimal false positives, but may miss novel attacks." to " URL"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Optimised for desktop environments. Scans are processed in under 5ms using native Kotlin Multiplatform binaries." to " Kotlin 5 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Scans for known malicious patterns and heuristic mismatches. Blocks homoglyph attacks and redirect chains. Low false positive rate expected." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Short URLs hide the actual destination. Prize claims from unknown numbers are almost always scams." to " URL "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Some minor security concerns were identified. The link appears mostly safe but review recommended." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Some suspicious indicators detected. Verify the source before entering sensitive information." to ""

MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The domain uses the Cyrillic '' (U+0430) instead of Latin 'a' (U+0061). This technique is commonly used to trick users into believing they are visiting a legitimate service." to "(U+0430)a(U+0061)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The domain uses the Cyrillic '' (U+0430) instead of Latin 'a' (U+0061)." to "(U+0430)a(U+0061)"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The entire threat signature database (100,000+ patterns) is stored locally for millisecond lookups without any network requests." to " 100,000 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The entire threat signature database is downloaded to your device for millisecond lookups." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The number 1 and lowercase L look identical in many fonts. Always verify paypal.com directly." to " 1 L paypal.com"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The scanned QR code contains malicious indicators associated with phishing and credential harvesting. Do not proceed to the target URL." to " QR URL"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"The scanned QR code shows suspicious patterns that may indicate potential security risks. Proceed with caution." to " QR "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Think you can outsmart our AI? Try to craft a phishing URL that fools the detector!" to " URL"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"This URL was flagged by Mehr Guard\\'s offline phishing detection engine." to " URL Mehr Guard\\ "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"This image was analysed locally on your device. No data was sent to the cloud for this verdict." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"This is a Google subdomain - check if it\\'s the legitimate Gmail service." to " Google - Gmail "

MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"This may happen if: You're using a very old browser JavaScript is disabled The page didn't fully load Try refreshing the page. If the issue persists, try Chrome, Firefox, or Safari." to " JavaScript ChromeFirefox Safari"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Tips for better scanning: Ensure good lighting Hold the camera steady Fill the frame with the QR code Avoid glare or reflections Try uploading a clearer image" to " "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"URL path contains /login, /signin, /verify, /secure, /account" to "URL /login/signin/verify/secure/account"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Users may not notice subtle character swaps like \"1\" for \"l\" or \"0\" for \"o\"" to "1l0o"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Verified by local heuristics v2.4. No phishing patterns, obfuscated scripts, or blacklist matches found." to " v2.4 "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"We strictly disable outgoing telemetry for scans. Scan results and image hashes remain local." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Without other risk signals, login paths on safe domains would not increase score significantly." to ""

MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Would you like to report this URL?\\n\\nOptions:\\n1. PhishTank - Click OK to open submission page\\n2. Email - Click Cancel to compose email\\n\\nURL: {url}" to " URL \\n\\n\\n1. PhishTank - \\n2. - \\n\\nURL: {url}"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"You can still use Mehr Guard by uploading images or pasting URLs directly." to " URL Mehr Guard"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"You can still use Mehr Guard: Upload QR code images Paste URLs directly Use the sample URLs provided" to " Mehr Guard URL URL"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Your browser doesn\\'t support camera access, or you\\'re on a device without a camera." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"Your data never leaves this device. All processing is local. No tracking, no uploads." to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"\"Always expand short links before scanning. The bot does this automatically by following redirect headers without rendering the page.\"" to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"\"AusPost: Your parcel failed delivery due to incorrect address details. Please update immediately via the link above to avoid return.\"" to "AusPost"
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"\"Commonwealth Bank: Your account has been locked due to suspicious activity. Verify your identity immediately.\"" to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"\"Your Apple ID was used to sign in on a new device. If this was not you, verify immediately.\"" to " Apple ID "
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$"characters often associated with phishing campaigns targeting financial institutions. The domain age is" to ""
MaxLineLength:WebStringsZh.kt$" Zero data collection Same engine as Android & iOS Ensemble ML (25+ heuristics)" to " Android iOS Ensemble ML25+ "
